text: Va [hamon] kasone, ki cun murtakiʙ [-i gunohi ʙuzurg va] kori ziste sudand jo [ʙo ancomi digar gunohon] ʙar xud sitam kardand, Allohro ʙa jod meovarand va ʙaroi gunohonason omurzis mexohand – va cuz Alloh taolo ci kase gunohonro meomurzad? – Va ʙar on ci kardaand pofisori namekunand, dar hole ki medonand [gunahkorand va Alloh taolo ʙaxsojanda va tavʙapazir ast]
